pipeline.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a line of connecting pipes, often under the ground, used for sending gas, oil etc over long distances
pipeline.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a line of connecting pipes, often under the ground or sea, used for taking gas, oil etc over long distances
pipeline.translation[1].definitions[0].e: a plan to build a 250-kilometer pipeline to supply the city with water
pipeline.translation[1].definitions[1].d: if a plan, idea, or event is in the pipeline, it is still being prepared, but it will happen or be completed soon
pipeline.translation[1].definitions[1].e: The company has other distribution deals in the pipeline which will be announced over the next few weeks.
